title: [Kraken's Fall, Middle Arm Ave]
description: Starlight silvers the avenue as it stretches away from the open-air market towards the eastern edges of town.  Clapboard bungalows with thatched rooves are surrounded by wild thistle and scraggly beach grasses that sway in the persistent seaborne breeze.  A tall signpost dangling a pristine white sign sits at the top of a pathway lined with wild blueberry bushes that leads to a small single-story building.
